title: It Was Always Love
description: ♡Today’s love doesn’t always have to look like yesterday’s love ♡  Book 2 in a set of 2.  Love is blind. And the universe hates me. Serious fricking hate. To catch you up; Southern girl falls for extremely wealthy and gorgeous gay. We became besties. Then in an epic plot twist my gay... caught feelings for me. Unbelievable, right?  I should have known I was deluding myself. Now I’m left broken. Only, Noah tells me it wasn’t a lie. Can I believe the happily ever after he promises? It’s not only me to convince ... but everyone else.  I’m Sena Black and is he still …. Straight-for-me?
author: V. Theia
